backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling lead submission, user profiles, and admin-restricted lead queries with integrated authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summarized descriptions of all frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme support.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration and top-level routes using the SiteLayout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingPlan: Reusable pricing card component showing plan details, features, price, and CTA button with optional highlight state.
frontend/src/components/site/ResourceLis: Displays a grid of downloadable resources with icons, descriptions, and file type indicators.
frontend/src/components/site/routes.ts: Defines route paths and corresponding display labels for site navigation.
frontend/src/components/site/Seo.tsx: Sets dynamic page title and meta description on render for SEO.
frontend/src/components/site/ServiceCard: Reusable service card showing an optional icon, title, description, and optional CTA action.
Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, legal text, and a copyright note.
Provides a responsive site header with branding, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area using React Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/site/StepsTimeli: Displays a vertical or horizontal timeline of steps with numbers, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching leads ordered by timestamp, name, or filtered by business stage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLead.ts: Exposes a mutation to submit a lead and invalidates related lead queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and custom Saudi-themed color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with mission, vision, and platform value sections using icons and styled layouts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with lead submission logic and a thank-you state after successful submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, trust indicators, and feature highlights, including navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Shows a three-step business setup process with benefits and a call-to-action section.
frontend/src/pages/MentorshipNetworkingP: Provides information on mentorship and networking offerings with mentor benefits and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders pricing plans with monthly/yearly toggle, enterprise options, and pay-per-service items using plan cards and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Displays categorized downloadable resources including templates, checklists, guides, and knowledge base articles with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists core service offerings as cards with descriptions and a CTA to contact, including SEO and an additional expert-help section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the projectâ€™s styling system.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, requirements, features, design notes, and image needs for the Saudi Business Launchpad platform.
